plot outline: Ganesh is an orphan who is brought up in a poor surrounding. It is his education that helps him as an added advantage to his growing crackers business. Rs. Five Lakhs is needed for his sister's wedding and that makes him take a chance to expand his business. Fate has something else written for him and hence he runs under huge loss. During all this, he has given his heart to a wealthy industrialist and wishes to get married to her.
title: Chellata
plot: A poor orphan falls in love with a wealthy industrialist.

Ganesh is an orphan who is brought up in a poor surrounding. It is his education that helps him as an added advantage to his growing crackers business. Rs. Five Lakhs is needed for his sister's wedding and that makes him take a chance to expand his business. Fate has something else written for him and hence he runs under huge loss. During all this, he has given his heart to a wealthy industrialist and wishes to get married to her.::Girish
